scripts.ts-build: npm run ts-compile && npm run ts-lint
scripts.create-db-server: docker run --name tspoc-postgres -p 5432:5432 -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=p@ssw0rd -d postgres:10.5 && sleep 5
scripts.create-db: docker run -it --rm -e PGPASSWORD=p@ssw0rd postgres:10.5 psql -h 172.17.0.1 -U postgres -c 'create database tspocdb;'
scripts.create-db-table: docker run -it --rm -e PGPASSWORD=p@ssw0rd postgres:10.5 psql -h 172.17.0.1 -U postgres -c '\c tspocdb' -c 'create table todos(id varchar (48) primary key, version int not null, created_at bigint not null, updated_at bigint not null, data jsonb not null);'
scripts.db-start: npm run create-db-server && npm run create-db && npm run create-db-table
scripts.db-stop: docker stop tspoc-postgres && docker rm tspoc-postgres
scripts.dev: npm run ts-compile-watch & npm run nodemon
